253746.「だが ひとつだけ はっきりしている。\n 我は この聖域の守護を 命じられし者:
But one thing is clear. I am the one charged
with Guarding this sanctuary!

253748.「おろかなる侵入者よ！！ \n 我が聖域を 汚した罪\n 死をもって 償うがいい:
Stupid intruder! You will pay in death for the
crime of defiling my sanctuary!

253776.「斬新な ヒズミの消し方だ！\n たいした手並みだったぞ 護りの手よ。:
A novel way to get rid of Hizmet! Well done,
my protective hand.

253777.「ああやって 魔物と同化した状態なら\n 魔物を倒すことで ヒズミを消せるんだな:
If you're assimilated with a monster like
that, you can eliminate Hizumi by defeating
the monster. I've never heard of that before.

253778.「しかし あの大きさのヒズミが\n 自然発生するとは……この世界は 重症だな。:
But to think that a hissing fish of that
magnitude could spontaneously arise...this
world is in serious trouble.

253779.「知ってのとおり 偽りの世界にある物は\n 全て あの大魔王により 創られたもの:
As you know, everything in the false world was
created by that Great Demon King.

253780.「だが 大魔王は死んだ。創造主が不在で\n 安定性を欠いたまま 放置されたがゆえ:
But Great Demon King is dead. Is it because the Creator has been left without a Lord and without stability that hissing is more likely
to occur?

253781.「……断っておくが ここのヒズミは\n 滅びの手の しわざじゃない。\n 断じて:
I must assure you, the hizumis here are not
the work of the Hand of Doom. It is a natural
occurrence.

253782.「……おや？ その間抜けヅラ。\n まさか 何も 聞かされてないのか？:
Oh? That stupid wig. Don't tell me you haven't
heard anything?

253783.「まあ 奴には奴の 思惑があるんだろうよ。\n くわしいことが 知りたきゃ\n:
Well, I guess he has his own agenda. If you
want to know more, ask Fabiel.

253784.「ン……自己紹介が まだだったな。\n 俺は メドナム。滅びの手の 選定者だ。:
I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Mednam. I
am the Hand of Perdition.

253785.「役者は そろいつつある。\n 破魂の審判の幕開けも 近いだろうよ。:
The actors are all lined up. The dawn of the
Judge of Souls' judgement will soon be upon
us.

253786.「俺の選んだ 滅びの手は 手ごわいぞ。\n フフフ……フハハハハァ！:
My chosen Hand of Doom is formidable. Hmph...
hhhahahahahaha!

253787.この地の 異変の原因は 消えたようだ。\nファビエルに 報告しにいこう。:
It seems that the cause of the anomaly in this
region has been eliminated. Let's go tell
Fabiel.
